member.name: FXREVERB_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Parameters for use with the FXReverb XAPO.

member.name: FXREVERB_PARAMETERS.Diffusion
member.summary: Controls the character of the individual wall reflections. Set to minimum value to simulate a hard flat surface and to maximum value to simulate a diffuse surface.Value must be between FXREVERB_MIN_DIFFUSION and FXREVERB_MAX_DIFFUSION.

member.name: FXREVERB_PARAMETERS.RoomSize
member.summary: Size of the room. Value must be between FXREVERB_MIN_ROOMSIZE and FXREVERB_MAX_ROOMSIZE. Note that physical meaning of RoomSize is subjective and not tied to any particular units. A smaller value will result in reflections reaching the listener more quickly while reflections will take longer with larger values for RoomSize.
